author: bencomic

left.text: and what's so funny about me playing my violin?

right.text: jazzy, we had a saying about violin players when i was in the school band

left.text: I have one, and I'm good

right.text: if a guy plays the violin... he'll probably suck your dick

left.text: if a girl plays the violin, she'll probably suck your dick

title: it's funny because jazzy hates gays
